Let me introduce myself

I'm a generic lad pursuing Bachelor of Technology in the field of Computer Science and Engineering from Amity School of Engineering and Technology, Amity University Noida. I was born in New Delhi but raised in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh. My interests are Web development and Graphic Design, and I love to do natural photography and listen to some of my favourite songs when Im free. I have a great sense of humour and always try to make people laugh, make friends and socialise. I always believe that there's no religion above humanity and sincerity and that none shall make excuses for voilating them.

Projects / Experience

YOUtilties

An utility website containing smaller web applications for daily use

YOUtilties was made to improve time management by allowing users to have access to smaller web tools all at one place that are used almost daily and have better user interface and experience with innovative neumorphic design.

PassLock

A personal password managing website with security

PassLock helps me to save passwords and IDs from several different accounts. It is quite secure as the javascript files are obfuscated so that the code in non readable and the passwords remain safe. The best part is that I can access it through both my laptop and my mobile, allowing me to copy paste passwords anywhere I want

Star Wars : Naval Supremacy

An Indie developer game

Developed using Unity 3D and C#, Star Wars: Naval Supremacy is a fan made indie game for PC supporting Windows 10 platforms and is inspired from the famous Star Wars franchise

Photography / Photo Editing

I love to do natural photography when Im free and also edit them into something even better. I also edit portaits and make wallpapers.
